summary: Test file of remeshed Falmer boots to fit artifex0\'s Argonian Raptor Feet mod.  They are playable and can be found in the Whiterun Guardhouse.
descriptionHtml:
Test file of remeshed Falmer boots to fit artifex0\\\'s Argonian Raptor Feet mod.  They are playable and can be found in the Whiterun Guardhouse.  

I believe the normal maps are not displaying correctly so the textures look flat.  I am just learning how to mod for Skyrim and have been looking at tutorials and troubleshooting posts but cannot fix the texture/normal/shader issue.  Somebody please help!  If I figure out what\\\'s wrong I will soon be making Footwraps and Helmets that display horns hopefully.

Edit: Sorry my mistake - what I thought were flat textures due to a normal map display issue due to an error in Nifskope are actually the default in-game Falmer textures lol - they are really atrocious because the front face of the Bethesda boot mesh is completely flat and made up of like two polygons vertically split lengthwise down the middle - meaning it\'s impossible to make these boots not look flat on the front.  Will be working on an alternate mesh soon.
author: CowpocalypseNow
